author: Source: Thurrock Gazette
title: Matt Damon and Jessica Chastain attend The Martian premiere Matt... - Thurrock Gazette
text:
Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain and Kate Mara were among the star-studded cast who dazzled on the red carpet at The Martian's European premiere in Leicester Square. Oscar nominee Chiwetel Ejiofor also greeted the crowds and said he would have taken a different career path if he'd seen the science-fiction film, directed by Ridley Scott, as a child.
 Thurrock Gazette.
